simpplle.comcode

Class ProcessOccurrenceSpreadingFire

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpplle.comcode.ProcessOccurrence
      • simpplle.comcode.ProcessOccurrenceSpreading
        • simpplle.comcode.ProcessOccurrenceSpreadingFire
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable

    public class ProcessOccurrenceSpreadingFire
extends ProcessOccurrenceSpreading
implements java.io.Externalizable
    The University of Montana owns copyright of the designated documentation contained within this file as part of the software product designated by Uniform Resource Identifier UM-OpenSIMPPLLE-0.9. By copying this file the user accepts the University of Montana Open Source License Contract pertaining to this documentation and agrees to abide by all restrictions, requirements, and assertions contained therein. All Other Rights Reserved.

    The idea behind this class is that we needed an entity to represent a fire event. Where the unit of origin and units it spread to are stored as well as holding the methods that determine where and how a fire event will spread.

    It was not named FireEvent as that name is already taken to represent a kind of process.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • hasNonBurningNeighbors

        private boolean hasNonBurningNeighbors(Evu unit)
        Find out if this unit has any neighbors that are not burning. If so we can build line here. More ideal would be finding only perimeter units, but not sure how best to achieve that right now without significantly affecting performance.
        Parameters:
        unit -
        Returns:

      • getNonBurningLowestNeighbor

        private Evu getNonBurningLowestNeighbor(Evu unit)

      • findLowestElevationNonSrfNonSuppNode

        protected ProcessOccurrenceSpreading.Node findLowestElevationNonSrfNonSuppNode()
        Find the node whose unit is lowest in elevation relative to the root node. Also make sure that the we only consider node that don't have stand replacing fire or fire line, as suppression forces cannot build line there. 8/23/11 Added check for beyond A suppression 8/24/11 Added check for non burning neighbors
        Returns:
        a Node, the lowest non-stand-replace-fire non-suppressed node.

      • doSpread

        public void doSpread()
        23 August 2004. Modified code to allow any event to spread as extreme if the FireEvent.isExtremeSpread() return true. Previously we had it restricted so that only events that originate in a StandReplacingFire unit could become extreme from probability. will check if suppression forces are here and do line calculations when starting at the from node and getting ready to spread. Will need to start building suppression line at the lowest elevation node. Pop a node off the queue and try to spread to its adjacent units, then return to allow spreading of other events to occur.
        Overrides:
        doSpread in class ProcessOccurrenceSpreading

      • doFireSpotting

        public void doFireSpotting(Evu fromEvu)
        July 2004. Removed restriction that said adjacent units had to be above the from unit in order to start a spot fire. 23 August 2004. Modified spotting so that it can only spot from a unit with StandReplacingFire. Previously there was no restriction on fire type.
        Parameters:
        fromEvu - The unit we are trying to spot a fire from.
